html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen to make cooking less stressful or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone.  Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting nerds at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top five Amazon deals right now, including a feature-stocked espresso maker, an Amazon smart speaker and even Bose earbuds, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. Need gift ideas? We've got you covered there, too. 

► Holiday Gift Guide 2021:  100 amazing gifts for every type of person and budget

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The 5 best Amazon deals you can get today

1. 50% off: This premium e-reading service

If you're looking for unrestricted access to the best books and most interesting magazines in print, you can get that and more with a membership to Kindle Unlimited. Amazon's premium e-reading service is offering new subscribers a six-month membership for just $30–that's a $29.94 price cut from the normal six-month cost of  $59.94. (Note that after the six-month period, subscribers will be charged $9.99 monthly). Amazon promises unlimited access to more than two million books (many of which feature Audible narration for audiobook fans) on any mobile device with the Kindle app. Whether you're into classics like The Hobbit or a new page-turner, Kindle Unlimited has you covered. 

Get 6 Months of Kindle Unlimited for $30 (Save $29.94)

2. Save $20: One of our favorite smart home devices

Amazon's vast line of Echo devices offers homeowners easy and intuitive entries into the world of smart home technology and now, one of its most popular products is back on sale. The Echo Dot (4th Generation) speaker is now available at a 40% discount from its list price of $49.99, bringing the price down to just $29.99. When we tested the Echo Dot, we were impressed with the sleek aesthetic of its orb-like design and the surprisingly good sound quality from the built-in speakers. The ever-useful Alexa smart assistant also offers compatibility with other smart devices when you're ready to add more to your home setup.

Get the Amazon Echo Dot (4th Generation) for $29.99 (Save $20)

3. Up to 28% off: These Bose wireless earbuds

Play your favorite tunes while saving big with these Bose earbuds on sale at Amazon. You can get the Bose QuietComfort earbuds for $199–an $80 price cut from the regular listing of $279. In our testing, we raved about the best-in-class noise-canceling technology built into the buds that blocked out bustling traffic and strong winds to better enjoy the clear sound. The Bose Sport earbuds are also available for $30 off, ringing up for just $149. The company says the Sport earbuds come with three sizes of StayHear Max tips so you can find the fit that best suits your ears, and are sweat and weather-resistant to withstand the most intense workout conditions.

Save up to 28% on Bose earbuds

4. Less than $120: This spacious computer desk

Give your home office an upgrade with this Rockpoint computer desk, on sale for as low as $119.80. Depending on the color, this single-drawer desk usually costs up to $145, but right now it can be yours at a wallet-friendly price. Rockpoint says its desk creates a user-friendly workspace thanks to its minimal footprint and numerous storage compartments. It also features a keyboard tray to give extra space between you and the desk so you don't feel chained to the Rockpoint while typing away.

Get the Rockpoint Axess Computer Desk with Keyboard Tray from $119.80 (Save $11.84 to $25.19)

5. Save $100: This Breville espresso machine

Give your mornings a barista-approved kick with the Breville Barista Express, discounted by $100 right now. Available in stainless steel and Black Sesame finishes, you can get the espresso machine for $599.95, down from its list price of $699.95. Breville says the Barista Express features dose-control grinding for just the right amount of beans in your brew and a grind-size dial. 

Get the Breville Barista Express Espresso Machine for $599.95 (Save $100)

Amazon deals you may have missed

1. iRobot Roomba j7+ Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum

During the holidays, cleaning is probably one of the many time consuming tasks on your to-do list. Luckily, with a robot vacuum, you can keep your home in tip-top shape with minimal effort. The iRobot Roomba j7+ is the best robot vacuum we've ever tested, and right now, you can take home the self-emptying Roomba for $649–a whopping $200.99 off the original $849.99 list price, and the lowest price we've ever seen. We think this robot vacuum is iRobot's best Roomba yet, and found it to have excellent navigation and cleaning capabilities. In testing, the j7+ easily maneuvered around furniture and, yes, dog poop and picked up just as much dirt as a full-sized vacuum. 

Get the iRobot Roomba j7+ Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum for $649 (Save $200.99)

2. Breville CS20001 Joule Sous Vide

Impress your friends this holiday season with home-cooked, restaurant-quality meals using the Breville CS20001 Joule sous vide. This pro-style immersion circulator measures just 11 inches in length (sleek enough to fit into a kitchen drawer) and, according to the brand, heats up fast for perfect results every time. Better still, this sous vide cooker is Wi-Fi and Bluetooth enabled, so you can closely monitor your food using the Joule app. Usually retailing for $199.95, you can take home this top-rated cooking tool for $159.95 today—a $40 savings. 

Get the Breville CS20001 Joule Sous Vide for $159.95 (Save $40)

3. Roku Express

If you're looking for a solid and affordable streaming device, the Roku Express is on sale today for $19—$10.99 off the original $29.99 list price. Designed for fast, HD streaming, this Roku model comes pre-loaded with hundreds of free TV channels and can be used to access popular streaming platforms like Netflix, Prime Video and Disney+. Better still, the device is easy to set up (just plug it in and connect to the internet) and can even be used with voice control when you link it to your Alexa or Google Home. 

Get the Roku Express for $19 (Save $10.99)  

4. Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Overhead Headphones 

The Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones are the best headphones we've ever tested and right now, you can take them home for the lowest price we've ever seen. Down from $349.99 to just $248 at Amazon, these top-tier headphones have excellent noise-canceling optimization and even have the ability to automatically pause your music when you begin speaking. The premium over-ear headphones topped our list thanks to their unbeatable comfort, amazing sound output and impressive customization abilities. If you need a cool tech gift for someone close, we think these are one of the best models money can buy. 

Get the Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise Canceling Overhead Headphones for $248 (Save $101.99)

5. Apple AirPods Pro

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for a 31% price cut right now. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that helps dampen environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $189.99—$59.01 off the full $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $189.99 (Save $59.01)

Other noteworthy Amazon deals we found 

  • Dash Rapid Egg Cooker from $14.99 (Save $2 to $13.01)
  • Amazon Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote for $24.99 (Save $15)
  • Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer and Volumizer Hot Air Brush from $34.88 (Save $11.11 to $25.11)
  • SodaStream Terra Sparkling Water Maker for $59.98 (Save $40.01)
  • Eufy by Anker BoostIQ RoboVac 11S at Amazon from $149.99 (Save $50 to $80)
  • Greek Chef Air Fryer Toaster Oven for $139.99 with on-page coupon (Save $60)
  • Winix 5500-2 Air Purifier for $159.99 (Save $90)
  • LG OLED C1 Series 55-Inch Alexa Built-In 4K Smart TV for $1,296.99 (Save $203)
  • Microsoft Surface Laptop 4 13.5-Inch Touchscreen Intel Core i7 (16GB) for $1,549 (Save $150.99)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.

This article originally appeared on Reviewed: Updated daily: Here are the 5 best Amazon deals today in December 2021
